title: Who is the best guitarist since Jimi Hendrix? - Quora

response.answer_text: For my money it’s Satriani,although if you were to look at individuality,originality,longevity and influence other guitarists like Eric Clapton,Mick Ronson,Eddie Van Halen,Billy Gibbons,Steve Vai,Eric Johnson,Yngwie Malmsteen,Paul Gilbert,Randy Rhoads,Zakk Wylde,Herman Li,Buckethead,Slash,Prince,John Petrucci,Hary Cody,Zoltan Bathory,Frank Zappa,Dimebag Darrell,Brian May,Devin Townsend,Jerry Cantrell,Alex Skolnick to name a few all have their strong points,original writing is more important in my eyes than derivative aping of other’s styles.That’s why my list includes no country or strictly blues music guitarists.Jmho

Probably, on balance, Nuno Bettencourt for his use of rhythm and Melody. However this is limited to the guitar playing, not the cultural or artistic contribution that Jimi made. Unfortunately beyond Pornograffiti and parts of the first album the artistic heights the output never really improved. I mean its good but not groundbreaking…
